Rhino Blaster RV Tank Rinser with Backflow Preventer for Toilet and Waste Tank Cleaning, Odor Control

Conquer lingering odors and keep your RV sparkling clean with the Rhino Blaster RV Tank Rinser! This powerful tool is designed to thoroughly flush your toilet and waste tanks, ensuring a fresh and hygienic environment for you and your family.

Equipped with a backflow preventer, the Rhino Blaster safeguards against unwanted contamination from the sewer system, giving you peace of mind during every flush.

  • Powerful Cleaning Action: Blast away waste and odors with ease.
  • Backflow Preventer: Keeps your RV safe from harmful backflow.
  • Easy to Use: Simple operation for hassle-free cleaning.

Enjoy a truly clean and odor-free RV experience with the Rhino Blaster Tank Rinser. It's the perfect solution for maintaining your RV's hygiene and keeping it smelling fresh on every adventure!

View on AliExpress

The Rhino Blaster RV Tank Rinser is your all-in-one solution for maintaining a fresh and clean RV. This powerful rinser effectively cleans your toilet and waste tank, combating odors and promoting overall hygiene.

  • Powerful Cleaning Action: Delivers a forceful stream to thoroughly flush away waste and residue from your RV's toilet and waste tanks.
  • Backflow Preventer: Safeguards against unwanted backflow, ensuring that clean water stays separate from the waste system.
  • Durable Construction: Built with high-quality materials designed to withstand the demands of frequent use in a rugged RV environment.

The Rhino Blaster RV Tank Rinser is engineered for optimal performance and user convenience.

  • Hose Length: A generously sized hose provides ample reach for easy connection and cleaning of both the toilet and waste tank.
  • Connector Types: Compatible with standard RV water connections, ensuring seamless integration into your existing system.

Investing in the Rhino Blaster RV Tank Rinser offers numerous advantages for you and your RV:

  • Effective Odor Control: Eliminates unpleasant odors by thoroughly cleaning the toilet and waste tank, keeping your RV smelling fresh.
  • Improved Hygiene: Promotes a more sanitary environment by preventing the buildup of harmful bacteria and germs within the waste system.
  • Peace of Mind: The backflow preventer safeguards against contamination, giving you confidence in the cleanliness of your water supply.

Using the Rhino Blaster RV Tank Rinser is simple and straightforward:

  1. Connect the rinser to a standard RV water source.
  2. Attach the hose to the toilet or waste tank flush valve.
  3. Turn on the water flow and allow the powerful stream to clean the designated area thoroughly.
  4. Repeat as needed for optimal cleaning results.

With its ease of use and robust features, the Rhino Blaster RV Tank Rinser is an essential tool for maintaining a clean, hygienic, and enjoyable RV experience.
